scripts.start: rm -rf node_modules && npm i && react-native link && watchman watch-del-all && rm -fr $TMPDIR/react-* && rm -rf ios/build/ModuleCache/* && rm -rf ios/build && rm -rf android/build && npm run ios && npm run android
scripts.build: rm -rf node_modules && npm i && react-native link && watchman watch-del-all && rm -fr $TMPDIR/react-* && rm -rf ios/build/ModuleCache/* && rm -rf ios/build && rm -rf android/build
